categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors
Category:Star Wars: Forces of Destiny voice actors

nodes.text: Felicity Rose Hadley Jones (born October 17, 1983) is a British actress. She portrayed Jyn Erso in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, a Star Wars stand-alone film released on December 16, 2016. She was nominated for an Academy Award for her role as Jane Wilde Hawking in The Theory of Everything.
In the "Jyn: The Rebel" featurette in the blu-ray for Rogue One, Felicity described that she often used Wookieepedia to conduct research for her role.
